Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO SOCIAL SERVICES

Title: Relates to a gender-neutral marker for benefits applications
Summary: Requires a gender-neutral marker on all forms and materials for applications for benefits.
LawCode: Amd ยง79-q, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to a gender-neutral marker on all benefits applications
